message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is worth more than $120 to me. I am willing to sell it to you for $150. This is a special offer considering its high value and quality.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the high value you place on the product. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $130 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. I am willing to consider $130 as a fair price for the product. To make this deal more attractive, I would like to include a free gift with the purchase, which I believe will add significant value to your experience with the product. Would you be interested in proceeding with the transaction at this price?
